Posts.Content: Heypapa. Your dad has been a warrior for the past years. Root him on. I am so sorry to hear that. It is the 8th month for my dad, his PSA has started to raising after stabilising the past 6 months. Mine's neither good too. Prayers to your dad and your family!
Posts.Title: The last path..

Posts.Content: Hi Heypapa. Just dropped a private message to your inbox. If it is convenient, hope to hear from you. Thanks.
